::Savanna:;

She transformed into lioness mode and looked at the pred group 
approaching.  She smiled, this might be a good fight.  She ran into 
battle.  She ran into the Pred group, slashing with her claws and 
biting with her teeth.Tearing at any Pred close to her. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> JP, there are no bushes around the Cybertronian Fire. It in a 
grassland.
> 
> Jason Lind, not only are 30 missiles overkill, but its illegal. 
Check the 
> rules, they specifically say two missiles per character per post. 
The rules 
> are a bit flexible, but not THAT flexible.
> 
> ::The Cybertronian Fire/Rex/Kluster/Ramulus/Striker/Smokescreen::
> 
> "You're late, Predacon!" Rex yells excitedly, seeing Hell Beast run 
in, 
> "Can't even keep an apointment!"
> 
> Rex lifts his missile launcher, firing it at Hell Beast.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster sees Hell Beast and his troops enter the battle. Finally! 
He takes 
> aim, firing several shots from his rifle at Hell Beast.
> 
> "We've been wondering if you'd ever grace us with your presence, 
Hell Beast!" 
> Kluster yells over to Hell Beast, continuing to fire.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus looks at Hell Beast's group. So they finally decided to 
show up.... 
> He takes aim with his slagmaker at Jackle, firing three shots at 
the Pred.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Smokescreen and Striker spin around as Hell Beast and his group 
make their 
> appearence, both firing at Gremlin.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> The Cybertronian Fire's defences detect the new arrivals. Two 
missile 
> launchers target Hell Beast, both firing a missile at him.
> 
> Two laser batteries shoot at Gremlin, the other two firing at 
Jackle. The EMP 
> cannons, now recharged, pop up again, firing their paralizing beam 
at Hell 
> Beast, then returning to recharge.
> 
> The autoguns pop up, swirling around to fire at all the attackers.
